website_summaries.verdict: An incredibly popular and versatile glass nail file, well loved for its consistently smooth, snag-free results.
pros: Constructed from high-quality, genuine Czech glass
Etched on both sides with a medium to fine grit
Works well on both natural and acrylic nails
Non-porous surface is hygienic and easy to clean with just a wipe or a rinse
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: We'd prefer a slightly sharper tip for filing cuticles
Thickness can be difficult to get under short nails

customer_reviews.title: good seller, took care of my problem quickly
customer_reviews.text: The abrasive frosting on top of the glass came off during first use ! This is a highly rated item so if you think you’ll have better luck then go for it ! Maybe I rub too hard, but there weren’t any directions saying to file gently lol. UPDATE: seller totally took care of the problem so I changed review from 1star to a neutral 3.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: It's Like A Little Gift From Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Oh Yeah! This is THE BEST EVER. It filed my nails at least five times faster than the crummy old emery-board types. CAVEAT: Do handle it extremely carefully, as it IS glass (or some type of "glass" composite). How do I know this: you guessed it .... I dropped it. It broke in two. I can still use it, but I obviously have to handle it very carefully. That said, I'll never go back to emery boards; this is really terrific ... and so, so time saving.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cupas

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: The nail file arrived quickly. I wasn't convinced about glass files; I kept picturing something that would make a horrible sound on my nails. This nail file is not only beautiful but it works so well. It's the smoothest finish on my nail I've ever had. It's not too rough and it's not too fine. My daughter thinks it's beautiful and wants one for herself even though she's only three. Honestly, it's one of the coolest things that I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice file, mediocre case
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about a glass nail file. I have been doing my own manicures for years and I have always purchased dual-sided large files from Sally Beauty. Tired of replacing those files and feeling as though I was generating too much garbage for a simple nail file, I decided to give this one a try. The file is NICE and it's not too fine a grit (read: it doesn't take forever to file my nails). It's great that it comes with a hard case - a glass file should be protected by a hard case, especially in a handbag. However, the case is very cheap. I'd pay more for a nicer case with this otherwise beautiful file.
customer_reviews.author: n.erin

customer_reviews.title: A Bit More 'Drag', But More Effective
customer_reviews.text: I really like this file- it's of good quality and very pretty. The only thing though is that it has more of a 'drag' than regular metal files. I would thought it to be the opposite and for it to slide very smoothly- but the upside to that is that it is far more effective in filing your nails. It only takes a few swipes here and there to file down your nail, whereas with my old metal file it would take me a half hour to file both hands. I think I'll be a repeat customer next time I need another file or want to gift one.
customer_reviews.author: Rotten Girl

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Glass file in a case. Cons: -The glass file tip edge is rounded so it cannot be used as a cuticle pusher/scraper without additional damage to nail. -The case is made out of cheap plastic that easily and often gets jostled open causing the file to not be in the case. Notes: I recently discovered that a thin metal file can also fit in the case along side the glass file, pro if you have it, con because if you do not, the glass file bounces around in its own case, probably assisting in the cap coming off. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Witchy

customer_reviews.title: What a great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I only recently read about glass nail files in a magazine article and ordered one right away. This is such a great product!! Way better than any nail file I've ever used, and the case that's included to keep it "safe" is great. I had no issues whatsoever using it and think it worked faster than a regular file. I also like that you can file your nails in either direction w/o worrying about your nails splitting. Very fine product which I'm recommending to all my friends! Great customer service as well, following up to see if I had received it and making sure I was pleased. Very much so!
customer_reviews.author: L. Vitro

customer_reviews.title: so far so good -nice case
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my walking pharmacy bag. I hate having a hangnail at any time. This is small and I carry it everywhere. Can't could the number of times I have whipped it out to correct a nail. It's pretty and durable so far. Better and subtle shaping then other types of files and emery boards More lasting than 7 sided foam ones too. It is glass though so I will file my kids nails with it, but never let them just take it. I've had glass files in the past and the only issues ever were with my kids breaking them.
customer_reviews.author: F. Dedon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Blue Nail File, Has Case
customer_reviews.text: A number of years ago, I bought a set of 5 glass nail files from Amazon. I kept 2 and gave the rest away as gifts. A few nights ago, I broke one of them, trying to get a splinter out of my foot, not a very smart move. I ordered this nail file as a replacement for the one I broke. It comes with a very nice case. Because of this hard protective case, I am going to carry this one in my purse and switch out the old one for the one I broke. It looks sturdy and well made, but I will be more careful with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love the vibrant colors! I recently started growing out my nails after having acrylics for a year and realizing how much damage they caused not to mention all the money I spent. I started watching a YouTube beauty guru with long nails who recommended one of these filers for anyone trying to grow out their nails and boy was she right. I’ve had so much less breakage and damage since switching, my sisters love it too it’s so much quieter my boyfriend doesn’t ask me to leave the room when I file my nails anymore. He hates the sound the other ones make.
customer_reviews.author: xoxo

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! I have several glass nail files from Bona Fide Beauty. They are all fantastic quality. They work so much better that other nail files do. This company has several pretty files from which to choose. I even have one for my dogs' nails. They seem to like it. Highly recommend Bona Fide Beauty nail files!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it does feel like scratching a keyboard and it makes me feel queezy sometimes, but it works and I prefer it over using the metal files. It files so much smoother! I can rinse it in water and it's all clean again. If you're gentle with it, you WON'T break it. If it breaks, you either dropped it or you're filing aggressively. If your nails require more aggressive filing, I highly recommend you keep your filing hand close to spot where you nail makes contact with the file. That way, you don't risk pressing to hard and forcing the file to break in half...hope that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fine grit file
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a big fan of DiamonDeb files, but tried this for something different. The DD files are good to hog off material from your nails, but this is a nice finishing nail file. The glass has a very small grit and works very well. A simple rinse and rub with water and it is back to full strength when it gets a little clogged. The only issue I come across is sometimes you can get an uncomfortable jumping/vibration if you push it at certain angles across the nails, but just easy up on the pressure a little bit and it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Futchko

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like nails on the chalkboard!!
customer_reviews.text: Hate it!! If you like the sound of nails on a chalkboard, or the sound of a fork scratching across a ceramic plate, then this product is for you. personally the sound and feeling of it literally makes my teeth hurt. I'll probably never buy anything like this again. I feel like it's just going to snap in half.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally no more snagging nails!
customer_reviews.text: I have used clippers to cut my nails my entire life. I am 59. I was grumbling to a female friend of mine about the way my nails always seemed to snag on stuff. She told me that I should be using a file instead of clippers. She recommended a glass file. I went ahead and ordered this one. I file my nails all the way down. They stay "snag free" until I re-file them about two weeks later. I could not be more pleased with this file.
customer_reviews.author: Knownasjim

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved
customer_reviews.text: So my file problem is solved. No more supermarket stuff that forces me to pay for the other implement(s) Packaged with it that I don't use and therefore don't want to pay for. Lots better than the cheap and not-so-cheap ones that never work to begin with. This is a better file than any I've ever had--gentle (if you go easy with it) and at the same time, it works. Have used it 10 or so times and have had nothing even close to a breakage problem. Maybe if I dropped it, but I haven't. I'll be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Snab

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: The first time I got a glass nail file, I didn't know the difference between the painted grit and actual etching. HUGE DIFFERENCE! My first cheapy file lasted a month. These ones (I bought three) have lasted MONTHS and are still like new. That's how you can tell these are made of genuine etched glass. They are omnidirectional and leave your nail tips feeling smooth. I keep one in both bathrooms as well as one in my purse, because if I have a nail file near me then I won't bite my nails!! :)
customer_reviews.author: NaySao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Nail File!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect from a glass file. I really like it! I apply very gentle pressure for smoothing and a bit more pressure to reduce the length of my nails. The file is easy to clean with a quick rinse. What a great product. I'm editing this to say I'm buying a second file. I broke the first one - my fault, not a product defect. I rinsed the file then pressed on it too hard while drying it in a towel. Actually, I'm going to buy extras for some friends. This file rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Elmblad

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Nail File
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other glass files and not been happy with the lack of grit on the file surface. Emory board's are mostly too rough for my thin nails. This file from Bona Fide Beauty has just the right amount of grit to smoothly shape my nails without tearing. Also, this is the first glass file I have bought that came in its own hard case, a definite plus. I am able to carry it safely in my purse without worry of breakage. Would definitely recommend purchase of this file.
customer_reviews.author: Carol3721

customer_reviews.title: Fragile!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that it is glass (haha). My kid has managed to break two of them in the last year. The ones I used to get at Sally’s would wear down and become dull in a couple months. These last much longer. As long as you don’t have a toddler that can knock them off the table.
customer_reviews.author: Nickola Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I believe this was a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to try this file. I’ve had negative experiences in the past. To me the case is very nice . I opened it use the file and it glided across my nails because the grit is very fine. I have very thin brittle chip easy nails and I know I have to use a very low grit file or the layers of my nails will split. I have bought the cheap so call Glass files before and they are nothing like this one. So far I’m pleased . I’ll have to see how long this one will last. I’ll try to update
customer_reviews.author: lavender

customer_reviews.title: Works Like Magic
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I've been looking for a nice product that would work well on my nails. I am learning to play Finger Style Guitar and my problem was shaping my nails and getting a smooth finish so my nails would not get caught on the strings. After I used the file I immediately noticed how easily my nails glided over the guitar strings while I was practicing. This file does the trick, in fact, I purchased two of them of which I gave one to my Guitar teacher.
customer_reviews.author: LFoster516

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this file
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this glass nail file. My nails always seemed to have a little rough spot that would catch on things. This file makes filing your nails a breeze, you barely have to file to make your nail tips smooth. I ordered the single file at first, but within hours of using it I ordered the 5 pack so I could keep a file in the car, my purse etc. All of my friends that I showed the file to ordered them also. I think I should receive a "kick back" for all the referrals. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic file
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have crappy nails that chip, split, break, nick...you name it. While most files take burrs and chips off, within a few minutes I can feel burrs or roughness again. Not with these. Absolutely the BEST files I have ever used. I've bought three so far, and not because they needed to be replaced. I got one for home, one for my purse, and one as a gift. I tried another brand glass file from a beauty supply and it was lousy. I honestly just cannot say enough good things about these. Lightest pressure is all it takes and nails are perfectly smooth when finished. After using for a while now, they're still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Darla P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome nail file!!!
customer_reviews.text: This nail file is amazing! I read reviews saying that it was too fine grit wise and it is fine but it filed my nails gently and quickly. It is somewhat like nails on a chalk board but it's a side to side motion when filing so it wasn't quite the same. I just filed slowly. I didn't find it to be uncomfortable at all and I hate nails on a chalkboard so I was relieved. The ONLY thing I'd improve is to offer a hard shell case as I'm afraid it will break in my bag. It seriously has been the BEST nail file I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: april marie

customer_reviews.title: Great nail file, love the fact it comes with a case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this nail file for travel. I had purchased one before that I've been using, I really like these glass files so I bought another one to keep with my travel items. The files work well for me and I love the fact that they come with a case. After a few uses, just rinse them off under water to clean them. Also, they have a variety of colors to choose from which can also be nice for family members to know which nail file is theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Mela

customer_reviews.title: Finally What I Have Been Looking For
customer_reviews.text: This nail file works very well in filing and shaping my fingernails. It is sturdy and files finely and easily. The tip does clean under my nails but is larger than a stainless nail file. I noticed several complaints about the plastic case. That is no big deal to me. I wanted a good file and that is what I got. The plastic case houses the file nicely where I keep it in my bathroom drawer. It might crack if it is kept in a purse but it works for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this beautiful nail file and have never had a crystal one before. I love it! It doesn't need a "fine" and "shaping" side to it because it does both very well. I wish the tip on it was a bit sharper for cleaning my nails, but overall, it's so pretty, comes with a nice case, and the filing is smooth sailing. Love it! Side note: I ordered it and it didn't come, so then not only did Amazon refund me, but the company sent another one free of charge. Very kind of them!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Wow, I am really impressed
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package, I was pretty certain I was going to want to return it because it felt like the grit was going to be too fine, but I was completely and totally wrong. This thing is a beast! And better yet, it requires very little pressure. A few passes and the nail shavings were falling like snow (sorry, gross). I rinsed and dried the file after my first use and there were no signs of wear. The grit seems unchanged as well. Finally, a nail file I won’t have to throw out in a month!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent File!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a glass file before and this was a game changer! Excellent quality, easy to use, and provides great results. I will not be going back to regular emory boards! I will be ordering more as gifts for my daughters. Very pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: storyman53

customer_reviews.title: Works with False nails as well
customer_reviews.text: This file is awesome. Holding up very well with false nails and my real nails. Shaves off the nail very quickly but controlled enough to form any shape you want with the nail. I brush off the excess after each use and it's good to go for the next set a few weeks later. Love the little case it comes in to protect it from snapping if I happen to toss it in my purse, or traveling. 5/5 would recommend for the lover of at home nails.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey V.

customer_reviews.title: happy w purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my first glass nail file. I'd been using a cheap emory board and noticed the tips of my nails were peeling. After a little research, glass nail files are supposed to be better for you so I decided to try one. It works fine, I'll see if my nails improve over time. I had a good impression of this seller after reading through some of the Q&A. The nail file is pretty. Overall I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cm kim

customer_reviews.title: Files quickly
customer_reviews.text: I now find that I no longer use clippers to trim my nails. Just file them down and they are smooth. Very fine finish on the file but removes nail quickly. Bought a file from store and after 2 filings it removed the grit and glass was smooth....
customer_reviews.author: Jack Huddle

customer_reviews.title: Bona Fida Nail File Etched in both Sides,  Plastic Case could be snugger so nail file doesn't move.
customer_reviews.text: These work well. They are 2mm in thickness. You can use both sides to file your nails. I have only used a few times and gave 4 stars longevity for two reasons: have not used much and the plastic case is nice but the file moves inside the case. This is a good quality glass nail file. I wish these cost less so I can have one in several places. The better quality all seem to cost around $9.99
customer_reviews.author: Joy 9

customer_reviews.title: Great nail file.
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a glass nail file before but now I won't go back. It files my nails so easily and leaves them so very smooth. I sometimes have a problem of getting a snag on a nail and this files them away so they don't return.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I had just rec'd one and my purse was snatched so I bought another one immediately I love it so much. My nails are always so frail and like to chip and flake in layers. Regular old emery boards just tore them up. So called "diamond" metal files were somewhat better. The czech glass files give me a very smooth and silky finish. I notice fewer chips, breaks and peeling of layers. I would recommend this product to anyone with similar nail problems. You will definitely notice a positive difference.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Don't drop it
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice, when I looked at it on socal. But when my 12yo opened it, it stuck in the case briefly. Which made her think that the case lid was part of the handle. It's not attached of course, so 3 seconds later we were sweeping broken glass off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Llama

customer_reviews.title: Nail Filing Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor, get yourself a glass nail file. For years I was using one of those cardboard sandpapery doohickeys that send shivers through your whole body and don't accomplish anything except splintering your nail in 60 different places. This file, while slightly more expensive than metal and foam/cardboard alternatives, won't break the bank and will actually make filing your nails a treat. This files your nails down smooth and even with ease. My nails even feel stronger overall whereas previously they would feel weak and brittle near the tips where I has used other files. I highly recommend this file.
customer_reviews.author: El_Kay00

customer_reviews.title: Glass Nail File
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found one of these files again. I had one years ago don't know what happened to it, so I know this is a great product. It files so good you don't have to apply any pressure what so ever.There is no ragged edges and make sure you file in one direction not that it will effect the file but it better for your nails. Glass files are very nice and this one comes in it's own case!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: High quality, but mildly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for evenly filing nails but it is unfortunate that the glass material results in an uncomfortable feeling while filing similar to nails on a chalkboard. No doubt this is because the glass is much less coarse than that of the average file but the discomfort is overcome in short order and does not take away for from its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love it! files very quickly, stays looking new
customer_reviews.text: it came exactly as described, and works wonders on my nails! I don't think I've ever used a proper nail file (only those cheap cardboard emery boards) and WOW the difference is obvious. First, this file works much faster than any other file I've used, you can quickly see the shape of your nails changing. It's better to go slow. The file is also easy to clean and looks brand new after wiping it (while other files quickly deteriorate and show wear). Also, my nail tips are very smooth and don't catch on my tights. They also have not chipped or cracked which they used to do all the time. Very good deal for the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing file that doesn't damage nails!
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth time I've bought one of the glass/crystal nail files because I keep recommending them to my friends and/or giving them out. I used to hate filing my nails with traditional emery boards because I felt like they tore up my nails: the edges were rough and my nails would start to peel in layers. Once I started using these, my nails filed down so smoothly that I don't even both with clippers anymore. Now it always looks like I have a fresh manicure when all I do is file my nails once a week. Considering the price and the aesthetic outcome of my nails, this is one of the best purchases I've ever made!
customer_reviews.author: AZShopper

customer_reviews.title: GLASS NAIL FILE by Bona Fide Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't imagine how this file, being glass, could have a rough enough surface to do much more than smooth nails, but there really is a rougher side to it. I've worked with ceramic files before and I think I prefer the glass. The file itself is very attractive and it doesn't tear nails like emory files can, and it takes the nail down faster than ceramic. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Makes filing a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: This nail file is awesome! I use it on natural and artificial nails. It seams to glide right through whatever I'm filing. Is soo much nicer than the typical sandpaper like files! I have been able to clean it very easily too when I'm done using it. The storage case however is very cheap feeling and the color is coming off of it, but honestly it does the job of storing my file, and protecting it from breaking soo... I don't really mind that. Would definitely recommend buying one. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Girl

customer_reviews.title: and I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was curious about trying this type of nail file, and I am glad I did! It works so well, and makes my nails oh so smooth! Be careful though, it works REALLY well, so don't be too file happy! :) It's gentle enough for my natural nails too, which was one of my main concerns. Bottom line: Great product, happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Got one as a gift from a friend who went to the Czech Republic but sadly it broke. Then I tried to find a cheap replacement from other sellers here on Amazon. But you do get what you paid for, its quality was awful. Then I found this Bona Fide files and it works magic, especially from a nail technician’s perspective. I bought it to use on my infant and now start buying it as gifts for friends. Gentle on sensitive skin, yet very effective. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tung Le

customer_reviews.title: Nails are in better condition since using this file
customer_reviews.text: I have had this file for 4 months. I have other files but prefer using this because it files very well while leaving the edges smooth. My nails seem to be growing longer faster. I think that's because my nails are not chipping or cracking because the edges are in better condition. I'm ordering another to keep in my purse and several to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S

customer_reviews.title: Good file, horribly cheap "case"
customer_reviews.text: I really like this file, it's brleautiful and sturdy. The case is suuuper cheap plastic and I would've preferred just a soft plastic sleeve instead to be honest. But I'm giving it 5 stars because I don't care about the case, I care about the file, and the file is great. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessicai28

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality file. and worth the money It smooths the edges of your nail very nicely. I can certainly guarantee you that it is ,in fact, made out of glass - because unfornately, i dropped my on the tile floor in my bathroom and it broke in right in half. So now I will be ordering a new one -
customer_reviews.author: tabee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had my file since January and the filing surface has already worn down. Glass files are supposed to last a lot longer. I will be looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Marshall

customer_reviews.title: The nail file is amazing, but the case leaves a lot to be desired...
customer_reviews.text: Then nail file is awesome, but the case is very cheap. Like surprisingly cheap. It is made of plastic. The nail file itself is very nice. **edit** I am editing this to add that the second day and the top has fallen off of the case. I could have ordered a set of 3 files for the price I paid for this one because i wanted the case to safely carry it in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great file in solid case
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item! I had a glass nail file for at least 5 years and it broke when packed during a trip. That is because the case was soft plastic and flexible. I ordered this new one and am so pleased - the case is solid and secure, the file itself works very well, files nails in a blink. Very nice product, packed and shipped in a sturdy outer box, very attractive, and hopefully will last long. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CaliCoastBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I love this file so much already. The first day I bought it I did my nails and wow I can’t believe how well it works. My boyfriend even used it and said he couldn’t believe how abrasive it was. And I LOVE the colors. It made my nails very smooth and took half the time a regular file would have. Definitely recommend this file for anyone who loves their nails like I do...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glass nail file
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ever glass nail file, and now that I have one, I wonder how I ever got by without one! It does an excellent job smoothing rough edges on nails with just a couple of passes. The surface of the glass is etched for the file grit so I expect it will last a long time. There is a bit of a learning curve with a glass file if you've never used one before, it is easy to file off more than you meant to very quickly if you're not careful. It also has more "drag" for lack of a better word, I found that switching direction of filing when you find it "dragging" helps.
customer_reviews.author: Roselle

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty file with a nice case.  This file cuts the filing time of my manicure in half.
customer_reviews.text: This file cuts the filing time of my manicure in half. I appreciate the efficiency. I like the case because I want to carry it in my purse all the time and I want the glass file protected. The case is plastic and it remains to be seen how long it will last, but it's attractive. I also like that the case and file come in a variety of colors. This is my second one; one for my purse, one for my vanity area.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Fairfax

customer_reviews.title: Came on time and the colors are pretty
customer_reviews.text: Got email confirmation that it was shipped day I bought it and came on date it specified. I have the red one my grandma bought me when I mentioned to her about how I need a new nail filer cause the cheap was would get worn out after a couple of use. The red one has been doing me good. So I got myself another one cause I always tell myself I need one for when I'm out and about.
customer_reviews.author: monica villa

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this item a few days ago and immediately went to town on my nails. This file works easily with very little pressure and files the the nails perfectly evenly. I like the hard plastic case it came in as well--it will make it easy to keep the file clean and free of lint/dust while in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Sold on this type of file!
customer_reviews.text: I nave never tried a glass nail file before. I will always use one going forward!! The grit nail files were always too rough or too fine. It was hard finding the perfect one for me. Then I read about glass nail files! This one is great. I can't say they all are since this is my first one, but this brand is perfect for my nails.
customer_reviews.author: marti

customer_reviews.title: BEST nail file!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this nail file listed on several Amazon-Favorites-Videos on YouTube and couldn't agree MORE! Not only is this nail file sleek and stylish -- but it also gives GREAT results! My nails felt softer after using this, than with any other file I've tried! Plus the little case means NO MESS! I take this in my purse everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: KFlurry

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I had a glass Czech file for many years that I bought here on Amazon. It wasn't aces, but a FAR cry from this little file. This one wasn't so good from the get go and then became worthless after just a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: trowbar

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this file! Having a case as part of price is great. Ended up buying two - one for around this house and one to carry in my purse. Have natural nails, so can't speak to salon-applied nails. Very pleased. (Gave 4 stars as only had for 2 weeks, hence longevity couldn't be rated. Gave 5 stars in Easy to Hold and Value category.)
customer_reviews.author: VJS

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this thing. 100% recommend. I’ve been dealing with brittle, splitting nails that break constantly for years. My nails are stronger than ever now. I haven’t had a break since I started using it about a month ago now. It works really fast. You can have all your nails filed in like 3min. It actually seals your nail edges to keep them from breaking. Best file I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Graley

customer_reviews.title: Don't go for the cheap knock-offs - BUY THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail file! I had purchased a similar one many years ago, but I needed a replacement. I bought a cheap one somewhere else, and it stunk. I think that one had some sort of spray-on grit, where this one the surfaces are etched. It's glass, but it seems relatively tough. This is gentle on my nails, but does a great job. I would buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: Mans opinion
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would last. I don't know how long this will last but it seems like a good way to file the corners of my fingers. I like that the bottom of the file is smooth glass so it glides over my skin. Not sure if it will help with my hang nail problem but so far so good. Is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: mec888

customer_reviews.title: This nail file is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The case it comes with is a little cheap, but better than nothing. The file its self is amazing. It works wonders. It felt a little weird when I first used it. Then after a few minutes I fell in love. It almost melts your nail away, it works so well. It is a bit fragile though, so I wouldn't want to drop it. The file is more coarse at the top than the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: ALC

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a month!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this file for less than a month and it is already smoothe. The "grit" is mostly gone and is only left on a little area near the handle. After buying some Mont Bleu files that also didn't last, I bought these (1 file for $10 instead of 3 for $10) hoping they'd be better, but they turned out to be a giant disappointment. I always used them on natural nails and dip powder nails with water (as recommended by the seller) and rinsed then, but they still didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Over a year later and this thing is still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year and a half ago and will never pick another nail file again. It is so durable! It has not broken, chipped, or even gotten dull on me even though I've used it multiple times a week for this entire year and a half. Please throw away any of your crappy files that get dull after a month and BUY THIS ONE! It is gorgeous and files my nails so damn quickly from how great the texture is at shaping my nails. I am buying some for my friends as a stocking stuffer because it is that damn good.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Good for a smooth feeling nail.
customer_reviews.text: The reason for 3 stars for longevity, I haven't had it very long. I have used it several times. Each time I use it my nails are very smooth. I do prefer it to other nail files. I'm trying to take good care of it as it is glass. I gave 5 stars for the other questions. I do recommend a glass file.
customer_reviews.author: NormaJean.

customer_reviews.title: Never using another nail file again
customer_reviews.text: I've used pretty much every type of a file for nails and they all were horrible. There is a noticeable difference, for the better, with this one. It's much more efficient, has a nice handle for a better grip, and i love that it comes in a case (this way I can take this with me pretty much anywhere and use it right then and there versus having to wait till I get home). I love this and I think anyone would as well.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I never leave for reviews for anything on Amazon (why, I don’t know), but since this whole virus charade has me confined to home doing my own nails, I thought I’d give it go. It’s really great quality and I was surprised that it filed my nails so quick and precise! I don’t like to cut my nails since they’re very thin and break off easily but this might smooths my edges very nicely. 10/10 would recommend. Ps: it’s glass and it gives the disclaimer that if dropped from a high enough point, it may break. But definitely worth it to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Arguilez

customer_reviews.title: Good File for Finishing and Polishing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because a glass nail file sounded interesting. While I don't think it would be the best at shaping a nail, finishing and polishing or filing away small snags are probably its niche. I'm not sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: BEL

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Sorry
customer_reviews.text: These files do not file well at all. They look cute and come in there own individual cute containers but they are not worth the money. Not happy 😒
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice file
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this nail file. It’s sturdy and does file the nail with facility. It also comes with a plastic carrying case. Not sure about the claim the manufacturers made saying that using the file will make the nails stronger...Haven’t noticed a difference after using the file once or twice a week for about a month or so. At least it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Willson

customer_reviews.title: I am a guitarist and I love this file
customer_reviews.text: I am a guitarist and I love this file. In the past I have used emery boards and fine grit sand paper to get a smooth edge but this is by far the best file I have ever used. You don't even need to apply much pressure to get your nails filed down into the shape you desire. If you treat it well and wash it after use it should last a very long time. I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: It's a great file that can take down nails quickly, then smooth them to a finish. It's oddly constructed - instead of the usual coarse on one side, fine on the other, this file is the same on both sides: coarse near the base, fine near the tip. Once you're used to it, it's easy to use - it was a bit of a surprise at first. And I like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: W. Handy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4 of these, put them around various places. I tried carrying one in my purse with the holder and it broke! But other than that incident I have had zero problems with the files, I love them. When they get really dusty from nail flakes I clean it and it's brand new! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ray White

customer_reviews.title: This file is fantastic! It files down quickly and beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This file is fantastic! It files down quickly and beautifully. My nails are now holding shape, and I don't have to worry about an emery board losing its grit, or the grit being too rough on my nails causing snags. It's very smooth, and has a gorgeous color! I'm not worried about it breaking, because it wasn't horrendously expensive. I'm planning on buying another one to keep with me in my car. Very pleased with this file.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Czech Glass Files = Happy Nails
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Czech Glass nail files exclusively now for a little over a year, and my nails have stopped splitting and peeling. Since the type of nail file is the only thing I've changed, that has to be the reason. Completely shallow note: I have glass files in other brands, the ones from Bona Fide are the prettiest to look at. The coloring on the handles is almost pearlescent. It doesn't make them file better than the others, but they're more fun to look at :)
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Quality File All Around
customer_reviews.text: The nail file has a very nice gradient and is comfortable to hold. I've been using this for nearly a year and it still files my nails extremely well. As an added bonus it comes in a nice carrying case to keep it from being damaged when not in use. The file feels pretty durable and I have dropped it a few times without it breaking so there's no need to worry about any sort of skimp in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Keion

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails file.
customer_reviews.text: Toughest nail file on the market. Don’t let it being made out of glass fool you. This nail file is sturdy with longevity in filing down your nails. It’s also easy to clean, just rinse with water, and done. Most importantly it does a fantastic job on filing your nails.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Smooth manicure
customer_reviews.text: My normally strong nails have been peeling layers, splitting horizontally and vertically. Included in my efforts to improve their condition was the purchase of a glass file. LOVE it! This file is smooth to use, with no jagged or rough edges. I've read this will help with the peeling. I enjoy filing them now. Emery boards were harsh. Great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl E. Weagraff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & affordable magic!
customer_reviews.text: After constantly having to buy a new nail filer every so often, investing in this glass one was a smart move. It’s not expensive and it works beautifully. It’s so pretty, and super easy to use. Just bought it, so not sure how long it will last but so far it’s been great. It feels like it will be a long lasting product, which is why I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Vania Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: My friend had a glass nail file that she bought many years ago at a county fair. I researched online and found this one. I bought one for myself and for her. We love them and the colors and the cases that they come in. They are so much better than any other nail file that I have ever had. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Daph

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this file! It keeps my nails smooth. Just be careful when using it that you keep your fingers off of the glass part it will rub your skin off. I know that sounds like common sense but the part that you hold blends right in with the glass so it is easy for your fingers to end up on the wrong part of the file.
customer_reviews.author: melissa mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: I needed a glass file this size and wasn't sure which one to purchase. I'm glad I picked this one. It's pretty and has held up remarkably well. The case is fairly cheap plastic, but it does it's job. Overall it's a really good value for the money. Love this little file.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie in WS

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is intended to, not the most durable, but requires less motion to file nails. Box is very fragile, so you'll need a special place for it because it can get damaged. Id recommend it and I would buy another.. but I'd get a cloth or box storage for it.
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: Sized Just right
customer_reviews.text: Nice file. My wife loves it. She can put it her purse and it won't be damaged. I originally got it for myself so I wouldn't need to borrow hers (glass composition also), but hers is much longer, therefore bulky in a purse. Now she has taken this one. Happiness!
customer_reviews.author: Capt.Ross

customer_reviews.title: perfect file for thinner nails
customer_reviews.text: wow! truly think this file is GREAT. I just received it so I can't speak on the longevity of it but so far so good! It easily glides over my nails. I have thinner nails and regular nail files just don't do it for me and makes my nails seem thinner. This file is great and effortless. Recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: J.T

customer_reviews.title: Just as it appeared
customer_reviews.text: So, sometimes you order things and they come looking other than how they appeared on the website. In this case, it was exactly as it appeared and, as I expected. Since it had the super handy case, as promised, I popped it immediately into my purse for everyday use while out and about. Can't say that I have had a lot of opportunity to use it as yet but....it looks exactly like the one I have in my bath at home that I have loved for years so, I am certain it will work well. I am pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Lynema

customer_reviews.title: Throw your old file away!
customer_reviews.text: This file is sturdy and files really well. If you are going to invest in a file, I would make it a glass file. It does a fantastic job and is not too abrasive or rough. It is sharp (so keep away from kids and keep in case when not using) but I can tell this product will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Quality file
customer_reviews.text: I already own this file and love it. I have purchased others previously as gifts and my latest purchase is a gift as well. Several of my co-workers admired the one I gave as a secret Santa gift, so one of those admirers is getting it this year. Mine is two years old, still looks new and works the same as day one. I have natural nails and this file a gives me quick smooth edges without any snags. Best for me is the fact that filing can be done in both directions.
customer_reviews.author: Champ

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Grooming Instruments
customer_reviews.text: The glass nail file works as described. It is far easier on the nails than the disposable "sandpaper" type of emery board or metal nail files. It has a finer grit than either disposable or metal files. The file comes in a very attractive case to protect it from chipping or breaking. This product is worth every penny and will outlast hundreds of disposable emery boards.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zaberto

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I am holding this at the wrong angle but when I use it, it's like scratching my nails on a chalk board. I'm not deterring anyone else from buying because it could just be that I am sensitive to the material but that is my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Bee27

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really good file! My mum had one that was brilliant so decided to get my own and not disappointed, glass is so much smoother on the nails than a gritty file or metal one. This one came with a cute case as well which makes it so much better to carry around. I would say the best way to use it is to file in on direction on each side of the nail rather than going back and forth other wise it doesn't feel as smooth
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy this nail file. It’s great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice nail file. I purchased two by mistake but gave one as a gift. I loved it. Since then I bought more of them to give it as small presents. I cannot comment on durability...I make sure I don’t drop it. It’s glass! Also you can wash it with soap and water if you notice it doesn’t file as good. I have it for almost a year now and it work as new.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and service
customer_reviews.text: I like these glass files a lot. As a massage therapist and cellist, I file my nails daily. This one is pretty, and it is very helpful that it comes in a hard case. I gave them as gifts this past holiday to other cellists and they were appreciated. The file arrived in good condition and in a timely manner. I have had glass files from other manufacturers that weren't as good; they were less expensive, but the color rubbed off on my hands. Not the case with the nail files by Bona Fide Beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: No more splitting and peeling!
customer_reviews.text: My nails started splitting/peeling a year ago. I tried every product I could think of to make them stronger, and nothing worked. So I thought I would give this nail file a try. It couldn’t hurt, I thought. IT WORKED!!!! As their product description claimed, the keratin layers of my nails were sealed together at the end when using the file! No more peeling! My nail ends are great now, and despite the smoothness of the file, it works so much better than any metal or rough file I have ever used before! I am pleasantly surprised by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fiery K

customer_reviews.title: It really DOES make a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this for a month, but my nails seem to have improved remarkably! They rarely break, & I’ve had no peeling whatsoever. I chided myself for spending $10 on a fingernail file but think this pretty little gem is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen P. Stucker

customer_reviews.title: The best file I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews. I order from Amazon constantly but have never felt the need to write about any of the products... until I came across this nail file. I trim and then file my nails (I hate cutting my nails to the quick, so I just file them short and leave a little bit of nail). All the files I have used make my nails rough and they pick at clothing and drive me crazy! This nail file did NOT do that. My nails were so smooth when I was done. I was amazed at how well this product worked. I am ordering more in different colors and I plan to NEVER go back to a regular nail file!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Standard

customer_reviews.title: Best nail file
customer_reviews.text: I recently repurchased this product after misplacing the original. This nail file works on my nails, my kids nails, natural nails, even polished nails. No snags, no rough patches, and no splitting! Accept no imitators, those knock off products may look the same but are definitely not. After losing my first, I tried to replace it with a cheap knock off (which was ridiculous because the price on this is great) and was filled with instant regret. This file is the best. Rinses off with water, the included case provides protection, and it leave the smoothest nail edges.
customer_reviews.author: CSmith321

product_meta.title: Glass Nail File with Case, Glass Fingernail File for Professional Manicure Nail Care, Expertly Shape Nails & Enjoy a Smooth Finish - Bona Fide Beauty Cobalt/Neon Yellow Premium Czech Glass File
feature_bullets: EXCEPTIONAL NAIL HEALTH IN YOUR HANDS! Regular, long-term use strengthens & hardens nails, reducing nail splitting, chipping & peeling, allowing you to grow long, healthy, beautiful nails!
SMOOTH RESULTS THAT IMPRESS: Czech glass files seal the keratin layers together at the nail's edge, leaving nails smooth & healthy, with no jagged edges. Flaunt an impeccable manicure at all times.

FEELS FANTASTIC on your nails! Unlike other files, they file in both directions. Expertly shape nails with comfort, ease & efficiency. A smooth & gentle filing experience with zero irritating scraping sensation.
HANDY HARD CASE - Protective hard case is ideal for storing your file in your purse or bag, keep your file close by & always be prepared for emergency nail snags & accidental chips & breaks

DURABILITY & LONGEVITY: a high-quality, handmade product crafted from premium Czech ‘Bohemian’ glass, tempered (toughened) to ensure the glass is strong, wear-resistant & retains the integrity of the filing surface after multiple uses.
